meanings.definition: Aquatic plants that grow in ponds.
meanings.sent1: The pondweeds swayed gently in the water.
meanings.sent2: I saw some pondweeds while fishing at the pond.
meanings.sent3: The ducks played hide and seek among the pondweeds.
meanings.sent4: The pondweeds formed a lush green carpet on the surface of the pond.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight danced on the pondweeds, creating a beautiful sight.

meanings.sent1: There are many different types of pondweeds in this pond.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the pondweeds to learn more about them.
meanings.sent3: The pondweeds gathered for a secret meeting under the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: The pondweeds whispered to each other in the stillness of the night.
meanings.sent5: The pondweeds rustled softly as the wind passed through them.
